Caption: Bulwark here, You called, Commander?
Name: Announcement1

Caption: You, need something from Bulwark, little one?
Name: Announcement2

Caption: No please, go on. Bulwark's not busy.
Name: Announcement3

Caption: You want the best, Commander? Well you got Bulwark.
Name: Announcement4

Caption: Oh yeah, Narc's locked in.
Name: NarcMark1

Caption: Narc outbound. Think there's a cop joke there...
Name: NarcMark2

Caption: Target's marked with a Narc! Ha.
Name: NarcMark3

Caption: Tag, you're it.
Name: TargetTag1

Caption: Tag'em and bag'em cupcakes!
Name: TargetTag2

Caption: That target is painted like Picaso.
Name: TargetTag3

Caption: Didn't tell me he was a cop... He's going down.
Name: AttackNarc

Caption: Oh so that's what the laser pointer does...
Name: AttackTag

Caption: I knew I should of packed a sweater.
Name: BiomeArctic

Caption: Colder than a shoulder here, Commander.
Name: BiomeGlacial

Caption: This place is dryer than your sense of humor, Commander.
Name: BiomeAridCanyon

Caption: Think we'll see any giant reptiles out here?
Name: BiomeLushCanyon

Caption: Anyone here getting any... Deja Vu?
Name: BiomeEarthlike

Caption: If anyone sees any AirCon out there turn it on for me...
Name: BiomeEarthDesert

Caption: Oh wow, the colors are so distracting here!
Name: BiomeForestAutumn

Caption: Oh, you know this kind of weather always brings back good memories.
Name: BiomeForestSummer

Caption: Eh, there's bothing like a good cup of coco, am I right?
Name: BiomeForestWinter

Caption: You know, I was getting kind of attached to my skin like it was...
Name: BiomeHostile1

Caption: Smells like warcrimes and PTSD, commander.
Name: BiomeHostile2

Caption: Hey, think the crystals here show how we really feel?
Name: BiomeHostile3

Caption: Can you believe Ancient Terrans took so long to get here? Crazy.
Name: BiomeHostileMoon

Caption: Ah, you know the sims never really get the smell right for places like this.
Name: BiomeSulfur

Caption: Ha, feel like we might start seeing our demons around here.
Name: BiomeVolcano

Caption: Weapons hot, trigger fingers itchy. Point us in a direction Commander.
Name: MissionIntro1

Caption: Boots on the ground, time to make some noise.
Name: MissionIntro2

Caption: Alright, rule Number one. It's not called 'surrounded.' It's called a Target Rich Environment. Now let's dakka some metal.
Name: MissionIntro3

Caption: Haha... I knew you couldn't resist.
Name: PilotHired1

Caption: Oh yeah, it's all coming together.
Name: PilotHired2

Caption: Commader, hey there, hi there, ho there, need some help?
Name: PilotIntro1

Caption: I, uh, couldn't help notice your need for.... Skilled Pilots.
Name: PilotIntro2

Caption: Haha... Uh. The adventures we could have...
Name: PilotIntro3

Caption: You can trust me, Commander!
Name: OrderAccepted1

Caption: Well, I don't see anything wrong with that.
Name: OrderAccepted2

Caption: I will pop an inferno round into their chest, and roast crackers over their smoldering wreckage.
Name: TargetOrder1

Caption: I was just thinking how I needed more target practice!
Name: TargetOrder2

Caption: Oh Commander, you shouldn't have!
Name: TargetOrder3

Caption: Hehe, this is gonna be the Best, Day, Ever!
Name: TargetOrder4

Caption: Yaaaaaaay!
Name: TargetOrder5

Caption: Oh boy! Group activities!
Name: GroupTarget1

Caption: You really need, all of us on that target, Commader? I could probably do it myself.
Name: GroupTarget2

Caption: You just let us handle it from here.
Name: GroupTarget3

Caption: You, trying to tell me something, Commander?
Name: FollowOrder1

Caption: With you 'til the end, Commander.
Name: FollowOrder2

Caption: We some kind of, Fellowship now?
Name: GroupFollow1

Caption: Oh boy, the gang's all here!
Name: GroupFollow2

Caption: What's that supposed to mean?
Name: HoldFire1

Caption: Guess I'll take a nap then.
Name: HoldFire2

Caption: Is this one of those stealth mission things?
Name: GroupHoldFire1

Caption: Kinda boring, don't ya think?
Name: GroupHoldFire2

Caption: Well, now you're just talking nonesense, Commander...
Name: GroupHoldFire3

Caption: Was it something I said, Commander?
Name: MoveOrder1

Caption: My people need me, over that way.
Name: MoveOrder2

Caption: Ah, this is one those patrols things, huh?
Name: MoveOrder3

Caption: You need a big strong man to stand guard over here?
Name: MoveOrder4

Caption: You could've said you wanted some alone time, Commander...
Name: GroupMove1

Caption: We'll just, leave you alone for now...
Name: GroupMove2

Caption: Ah, Wall of Steel formation. I like the way you think.
Name: GroupMove3

Caption: I see, You're one of those 'stealth is optional' types, am I right?
Name: WeaponsFree1

Caption: I love the smell of gunpower.
Name: WeaponsFree2

Caption: That order might just be crazy enough to work...
Name: WeaponsFree3

Caption: That isn't how things work, Commander.
Name: InvalidGeneral1

Caption: Huh, sorry, I was looking at myself in the mirror... Could you repeat that?
Name: InvalidGeneral2

Caption: I haven't taken nearly enough shots to the head, to think that's a good idea.
Name: InvalidGeneral3

Caption: Commander, there's... Nothing there.
Name: InvalidTarget1

Caption: There's nothing to kill but time over there, Commander.
Name: InvalidTarget2

Caption: Huh. Usually you're smarter than that, Commander.
Name: InvalidTarget3

Caption: You're breaking some new ground there, Capernicus...
Name: InvalidMove1

Caption: Can't do it. Can't go to imagination land, Commander.
Name: InvalidMove2

Caption: Right, right... But uh, you first, Commander.
Name: InvalidMove3

Caption: Guarding this area, Commander.
Name: ArrivedMove1

Caption: So, uh... What do I do now?
Name: ArrivedMove2

Caption: Figure I have a bit of time to make some popcorn?
Name: ArrivedMove3

Caption: Stay true, flyboy...
Name: Died1

Caption: Hah, this has been a hell of an adventure, Commander…
Name: Died2

Caption: And the the wall comes crumbling down…
Name: Died3

Caption: Ah ha, pour one out for me!
Name: Died4

Caption: Ah, guess this is one check I'm not cashing out.
Name: Died5

Caption: So, this is how it feels from the other side...
Name: CritDied1

Caption: Taking as many with me as I can...
Name: CritDied2

Caption: Ah, looks like I'm going out the same way I came in, punching and screaming!
Name: CritDied3

Caption: Perspective's a hell of a thing...
Name: CritDied4

Caption: Oh yeah, got o- I mean, Friendly down!
Name: AllyDied1

Caption: I was just starting to like that one!
Name: AllyDied2

Caption: That's uh, actually a pretty rough loss...
Name: AllyDied3

Caption: I always knew I was your favorite.
Name: TwoLeft1

Caption: It's just you and me, now.
Name: TwoLeft2

Caption: Huh, kind of, quiet now.
Name: TwoLeft3

Caption: Betty says I'm going crit, gotta punch out!
Name: EjectCrit1

Caption: The whole 'mech's hissing and screaming, I'll see you back at the ship!
Name: EjectCrit2

Caption: Hitting the big red button before I go nova!
Name: EjectCrit3

Caption: I'm a sitting duck now Commander. Gotta punch out!
Name: EjectWeapons1

Caption: They took all my toys away, I'm going home!
Name: EjectWeapons2

Caption: They got all my guns, but they didn't take my good ol' parachute!
Name: EjectWeapons3

Caption: I just remembered... I uh, left the oven on in my bunk!
Name: EjectScared1

Caption: All that's left here is for the captain to go down with the ship... Good luck Commander!
Name: EjectScared2

Caption: Alright, this is just too much, even for someone as amazing as me!
Name: EjectScared3

Caption: Oh yeah, another one bites the dust.
Name: GeneralKill1

Caption: Haha, wooooh!
Name: GeneralKill2

Caption: I could do this aaaall day.
Name: GeneralKill3

Caption: You impressed by my big, growing kill count, Commander?
Name: GeneralKill4

Caption: Haha... Wanna see me do it again?
Name: GeneralKill5

Caption: That's one for the permanent record.
Name: MechKill1

Caption: Is it wrong that I'm sort of enjoying work today?
Name: MechKill2

Caption: That 'mech's nothing but salvage now!
Name: MechKill3

Caption: Ha, look at that. Shooting stars from below! Make a wish!
Name: MechKill4

Caption: Ha ha ha. Think I just watched that one's soul leave its body!
Name: MechKill5

Caption: I know what you're thinking commander. I'm the best. No wait... That's just me.
Name: CritKill1

Caption: They don't look so smug with a hole in their head.
Name: CritKill2

Caption: You know I'm something of a Gunslinger myself.
Name: CritKill3

Caption: Military-Grade Fireworks. My favorite.
Name: CritKill4

Caption: Tore the Pilot right out of that one!
Name: CritKill5

Caption: Alright, alright... That was pretty good.
Name: CommanderCrit1

Caption: Ha, that's the definition of 'look, but don't touch.'
Name: CommanderCrit3

Caption: Almost as good as me, Commander.
Name: CommanderCrit2

Caption: You see that right there, that's why you have the high score in the pods.
Name: CommanderCrit4

Caption: You're something of a big shot, aren't ya?
Name: CommanderHead1

Caption: Oh wow, I think you ended that pilot's whole bloodline, Commander.
Name: CommanderHead2

Caption: You’re starting to make me jealous with shots like that.
Name: CommanderHead3

Caption: Reds on Radar, commander!
Name: GeneralEnemy1

Caption: Rather be dead, than Red.
Name: GeneralEnemy2

Caption: Hopefuls, inbound!
Name: GeneralEnemy3

Caption: Confetti on it's way!
Name: GeneralEnemy4

Caption: Look commander, Flying Pinatas!
Name: AirboneContact1

Caption: Hey commander, we got party poppers!
Name: AirboneContact2

Caption: Eh, Fireworks just arrived.
Name: AirboneContact3

Caption: Well well well, if it isn't my favorite genre of music - Heavy Metal. Inbound!
Name: MechContact1

Caption: Finally some real competition!
Name: MechContact2

Caption: My favorite reds of the day!
Name: MechContact3

Caption: Oh look, they brought me presents, and it's not even my birthday!
Name: MechContact4

Caption: Ah, Commander, Crunchies on approach.
Name: VehicleContact1

Caption: Stepping Stones coming our way!
Name: VehicleContact2

Caption: Well would you look at that! the Turrets are starting to come towards us.
Name: VehicleContact3

Caption: URNG!
Name: GeneralPartLoss1

Caption: I can already hear the MechTechs getting angry at me.
Name: GeneralPartLoss2

Caption: Oh no, I think there's a screw loose somewhere.
Name: GeneralPartLoss3

Caption: Bet I can still hit them harder.
Name: GeneralPartLoss4

Caption: Ah, they just keep... Breaking me down.
Name: GeneralPartLoss5

Caption: Go ahead... Take it from me...
Name: GeneralPartLoss6

Caption: I guess they just, dis-armed me...
Name: LeftArmLoss1

Caption: They took ol' Lefty!
Name: LeftArmLoss2

Caption: They think they can slow me down.
Name: LeftLegLoss1

Caption: Well, there goes the left leg!
Name: LeftLegLoss2

Caption: Oh, that was a loud bang, hope it wasn't too important.
Name: LeftTorsoLoss1

Caption: I can't feel my left side anymore.
Name: LeftTorsoLoss2

Caption: That was my favorite arm...
Name: RightArmLoss1

Caption: No! Good ol' Righty!
Name: RightArmLoss2

Caption: Jokes on them, that part didn't have guns!
Name: RightLegLoss1

Caption: Well, there goes my right leg.
Name: RightLegLoss2

Caption: That's a big chunk missing from my 'mech.
Name: RightTorsoLoss1

Caption: Pop goes my right side!
Name: RightTorsoLoss2

Caption: Commander, you're barreling through me.
Name: FriendlyFire1

Caption: Woah woah woah, I'm not your cabin boy.
Name: FriendlyFire2

Caption: Please sir, can I have another?
Name: FriendlyFire3

Caption: Fire just hurts, nothing friendly about it!
Name: FriendlyFire4
